title: servers
body: im not to sure if this has happened to anyone else but i have been getting tremendous ping spikes i would go from 42 to over 1000 in a split second and constant ping mess ups in frequent games.  I can't do ranked games now because im afraid that i would lagout as soon as the fight starts and im tired of this.  I have even restarted my router and the lag still persists Riot please help man please fix this

replies.body: It sounds like your network is suffering from packet loss or a weak connection, which can cause this kind of lag or input delay.  I recommend running a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to help find out what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a list of steps to help get this resolved.  Let me know what you find!
